conbody.p: In previous versions, you can capture and rename captured objects but cannot change a Mobile objectâ€™s locator nor verify and highlight them. From version 7.6, you can capture, edit, verify and highlight a captured object to optimize its locator.
The Object Properties section now allows:

ul.li: Editing locator and locator strategy of an object.
Verifying and highlighting the object with the newly updated locator.
